description: I'm Jonathan Arturo López de la Garza, a passionate creative and results-driven senior software engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and building scalable web and mobile applications using React, Next.js, NestJS, and modern TypeScript stacks. Adept in atomic design, Storybook-driven UIs, and API architecture. Founder of multiple ventures including JG Charcutería and Nos imperii. Passionate about clean code, seamless UX, and pushing the limits of front-end innovation

items.title: Signal Processor UI
